item.title: Noticing UI: Shazam's loading screen
item.description: Shazam’s loading screen I was pleasantly surprised by Shazam’s iPhone app loading screen, and I took a look into what makes it stand out. Here’s what it looked like: This felt different, and it made me look at the experience of opening apps. I started by spending a bus ride home from work opening and closing apps to get a feel for why this wasn’t like other apps. Loading… A loading screen tells a user that the app or other result is not ready yet.
